text: Kana (iwe Muhammad (SAW)) uchishamiswa (nevasingatendi vanoramba Islaam), mashoko avo avanotaura anoshamisa zvekare: “Kana tave ivhu, tichamutswa here kuve muzvirokwazvo chisikwa chitsva?” Ndivo avo vanoramba Tenzi vavo! Ndivo avo vachange vane ngetani dzesimbi dzakasungirira maoko avo muhuro dzavo. Vachava vanhu vekumoto umo vachagara zvachose
